int step (int dt)
 State update function, is called once per frame, instantiates and emmits the particles.

Public Attributes

flyVector partcolor
 the emmited particles' color.

flyVector partcolorvar
 variation of the emmited particles' color.

float partbump
 the emmited particles' bump factor.

float partfriction
 the emmited particles' friction factor.

float partradius
 the emmited particles' radius.

float partmass
 the emmited particles' mass.

float partspeed
 the emmited particles' speed.

float partspeedvar
 variation of the emmited particles' speed.

float ax
 maximum random emmition angle in x.

float ay
 maximum random emmition angle in y.

int partcolflag
 the emmited particles' collision flag (0: no collision, 1: collide, 3: collide and die).

int texture
 the emmited particles' applied texture.

int emmtime
 total emmition time.

int totpart
 total number os particles to be emmited.

int fadetime
 fading time for the particles.

int drawflag
 particles drawing flag (0: draws the particles only, 1: draws a sprite from the emmiter to each particle).

Detailed Description

Particle system class.

This class implements a particle emmition system.
